author: stevenn
msg: - introduced a frivolous scheme to generate anchors for non-id'ed elements (please comment):

author: jefft
msg: If a section has an @id, use it in preference to the auto-generated id

author: jefft
msg: Fix bug where the skin was never changed after the first 'forrest' run, due to
the value being cached in build/tmp/context/WEB-INF/cocoon.xconf

author: jefft
msg: Don't put temporary files (destined for build/dist/shbat/WEB-INF) into the
webapp directory, as this causes conflicts.  Eg, before this fix, running 'ant
; forrest webapp ; ant' would effectively hardcode the skin for all subsequent
